item.title: Murghi Korma
item.description: A curry that is mild enough for anyone to eat.

item.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
item.description: Britain’s national dish. A curry that is mild enough for anyone to eat.

item.title: Chicken Stock
item.description: Chicken stock made from necks, wings, backs and drumsticks. This will make a rich full flavoured stock. Wings provide a lot of skin, fat and gelatinous tissue which will break down and increase the luxuriousness of the stock.
